aadarayata lingikathwaya adala na kiyala eka thanaka kiyala thawa thanaka thawa kathawak kiyanawaya.ekama lingaye un dennekta law karanda thahanam wagema (premaya lingikathwayen thora nowana nisa ) wiruddha lingikayo dennekta law kalata rathi keliyath thahanamya.meka patta aathal lokayakya.api me samajayema hadunu wadunu nisa echchara awulak penne nathiya.pitasakwala jiwiyek me katha tika ahuwanan uuta pissu hadenawaya.samaharawita un awilla me katha tika ahala pissu hadila giya wennatath puluwanya.kalekin dakke naththe ee nisa wennata atha.
